thread.title: U.S. Pastor Andrew Brunson Is Remanded in Custody in Turkey

author: David Gauthier-Villars
title: U.S. Pastor Andrew Brunson Is Remanded in Custody in Turkey
text:
YENI SAKRAN, Turkeyâ€”The American pastor Turkey accuses of colluding with terrorist groups was remanded in custody after a prolonged second day in court for a trial that is increasing strains between Washington and Ankara.
Ending a 10-hour hearing in Yeni Sakran, a coastal town in western Turkey, the presiding judge on Monday ordered Andrew Brunson to remain behind bars and adjourned the case to July 18.
